channel.title: genomics on Alexander Lab @ WHOI
channel.description: Recent content in genomics on Alexander Lab @ WHOI

item.title: Using anvi'o in interactive mode
item.description: Anvi’o is a powerful tool for analyzing and vizualizing ‘omics data, much of which relies on one’s ability to visualize those data. On Poseidon, it can sometimes be difficult to work with these kinds of plotting tools, because we’re working on the command line. To use anvi’o interactively on Poseidon, we need to go through a few extra steps. I’ll walk you through the whole installation of anvi’o here from start to finish!

item.title: We are hiring!
item.description: Are you a recent (or not so recent) graduate with an interest in biological oceanography or marine biology? Do you have molecular biology experience in the lab? Are you curious to learn more about how molecular biology can be used to study environmental systems? I am excited to announce that Carolyn Tepolt and I are looking to hire a joint research assistant (i.e. lab tech) to join our labs at the Woods Hole Oceanographic Institution.
